text:
Queen of the South’s Jon Ecker Opens Up About His Role and Growing Up With a Famous Father

Jon Ecker is heating up Queen of the South with his role as Guero, but the actor has a great storyline on and off the camera. The 34-year-old star is all too familiar with TV sets given…

http://ift.tt/2rBUG7T
